# Happywhale Reduce Resolution Dataset (128 x 128)

This will be a simple notebook that shows how we can look at the images in this dataset. To simplify we just want to load in an image and check that its shape is `(128, 128)` and then plot the image. We will use `cv2` to do so.

We will also use `glob` to load in the file names. For those who are not familiar with `glob` it is a really easy way to extract the filenames in a directory.
